name: Fantastic 4 - Flame On
Description: The Marvel Universe hangs in the balance! Doctor Doom and the Skrulls unleash chaos, leaving only the Fantastic Four to save the day. Switch between Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, The Thing, and Human Torch - combining their unique abilities in a thrilling test of teamwork and strategy. From New York's towering skyscrapers to the depths of the Negative Zone, face deadly traps, intense battles, and jaw-dropping surprises. With the fate of the world at stake, are you ready to "Flame On" and embark on this unforgettable superhero adventure?

name: Sega Smash Pack
Description: Get ready for an explosive gaming experience with the "Sega Smash Pack"! This action-packed collection brings together some of Sega's most iconic titles, promising intense battles and heart-pumping thrills. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a newcomer to these classics, prepare to be challenged like never before. From fast-paced beat-'em-ups to adrenaline-fueled shooters, each game will put your reflexes and skills to the ultimate test. Can you conquer the relentless enemies, overcome obstacles, and emerge victorious in this retro gaming gauntlet? Unleash your competitive spirit and smash your way to glory!

name: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Team
Description: Awakening in a strange new world as a Pokemon, you embark on a rescue mission like no other. Forge an unbreakable bond with your partner as you delve into treacherous mystery dungeons teeming with hostile foes and mind-bending puzzles. Master strategic turn-based combat, recruit fellow Pokemon allies, and unravel the enigmatic forces threatening this realm. With each perilous expedition, uncover clues about your true self while experiencing the camaraderie and challenges of life as a Pokemon. Can you conquer the unknown, save the day, and unlock the secrets lurking within these endless labyrinths?

name: Wade Hixton's Counter Punch
Description: Step into the gritty world of underground boxing with Wade Hixton! Punch your way through seedy locations and fierce opponents in this intense beat-'em-up. Master combos, unleash devastating counter-attacks, and upgrade your skills to become an unstoppable force. But beware, for each victory unveils a darker conspiracy lurking beneath the surface. Can you fight against the odds and uncover the truth behind this twisted game?

name: Ice Age 2 - The Meltdown
Description: The ice is melting, and prehistoric pandemonium ensues! Guide your favorite Ice Age heroes - Manny, Sid, Diego, and friends - on an epic adventure across treacherous landscapes. Brave fierce foes, solve hilarious puzzles, and master wild mini-games in this chaotic 3D platformer. With the valley at stake, can you lead this misfit herd to safety before the great meltdown?

name: Lizzie McGuire - On the Go!
Description: Step into Lizzie's shoes and navigate the roller-coaster ride of middle school life! From fashion faux pas to friendship fiascos, you'll face every tween's nightmare in this quirky adventure. Make tough choices, solve puzzles, and complete outrageous challenges to boost your popularity. But beware - one wrong move could leave you at the bottom of the social food chain. Can you survive middle school madness?

name: Van Helsing
Description: Darkness has descended, and only one man can stop the unholy forces - Van Helsing! Become the legendary monster hunter and battle Dracula's terrifying brood across haunting domains. Hone your combat skills, wield devastating weapons, and unlock game-changing upgrades to take on hell's mightiest beasts. From Transylvania's gothic castles to the streets of Paris, the ultimate showdown between good and evil awaits. Can you survive?

name: Backyard Hockey
Description: Lace up your skates for some seriously outrageous backyard puck action! Assemble your dream team of wacky neighborhood kids, each with unique talents and hilarious personalities. Deke past pesky hazards, unleash blazing slapshots, and dominate quirky arenas in intense high-scoring matches. With trash-talking rivals determined to reign supreme, can you lead your misfit crew to backyard hockey supremacy?

name: Super Bubble Pop
Description: Immerse yourself in a kaleidoscope of colorful bubble-popping bliss! With an arsenal of power-ups and innovative game modes, this frantic puzzle adventure will put your skills to the test. Race against the clock, strategize combos, and battle through increasingly challenging levels in your quest for the ultimate high score. But stay alert - one wrong move could burst your bubble dreams. Can you master the art of the pop?

name: Monster Force
Description: Darkness looms as an ancient evil awakens, unleashing a horde of terrifying monsters! Assume the role of a daring Monster Force recruit tasked with saving humanity. Master unique skills and upgradable attacks as you battle against spine-chilling creatures across post-apocalyptic wastelands. Strategize with your squad, scavenge for vital resources, and uncover secrets buried beneath the rubble. With the fate of the world hanging by a thread, can you harness your inner monster-slaying powers and become the ultimate force against the encroaching darkness? Prepare for an action-packed fight for survival!

name: Crash Bandicoot 2 - N-Tranced
Description: The mischievous Crash Bandicoot is back, and this time, he's been N-Tranced! Dive into daring platforming action as you guide Crash through mind-bending levels filled with wacky enemies, treacherous obstacles, and wumpa fruit galore. Master Crash's signature spin attack, rack up combos, and collect power-ups to conquer the nefarious forces controlling his every move. Can you break the trance and restore order to the wacky world of Crash Bandicoot?

name: Disney's Lilo & Stitch 2 - Haemsterviel Havoc
Description: The mischievous Dr. Hamsterviel is up to no good, and only Lilo and Stitch can stop him! Join the dynamic duo as they surf, fight, and dance through wacky levels inspired by Hawaii's breathtaking locales. Master outrageous combat skills, collect cosmic powerups, and recruit alien allies on your quest to thwart Hamsterviel's dastardly plans. With hilarious hijinks around every corner, can you embrace the ohana spirit to save the day?

name: Nicktoons - Battle for Volcano Island
Description: Your favorite Nicktoon heroes have been trapped on a mysterious island overrun by evil! From Invader Zim to Danny Phantom, you'll master each character's unique talents and explore twisted dimensions in this showdown of Nickelodeon proportions. Prepare for chaotic multiplayer battles, perilous platforming, and a barrage of pop-culture nods in your quest to escape Volcano Island. The ultimate Nicktoons crossover event awaits - are you game?

name: Marble Madness & Klax
Description: Two arcade classics collide in one intensely addictive package! Race against the clock as you guide your marble through mind-boggling mazes filled with hazards and traps. Then, put your puzzle prowess to the ultimate test in Klax's tile-matching frenzy. With pumping soundtracks and a kaleidoscope of visuals, can you conquer these retro challenges and etch your name among the high score legends?

name: Backyard Skateboarding
Description: Grab your board and get ready to shred the gnarliest backyard terrain! Build your own skate paradise by grinding rails, nailing sick tricks, and using objects as launching pads for insane combos. Compete in over-the-top challenges or session with friends in various multiplayer modes. Customize your character and unlock fresh gear as you become the undisputed neighborhood shredding king!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants - SuperSponge
Description: Bikini Bottom needs you, underWHEEE! Team up with SpongeBob in his wackiest outing yet as he battles the dastardly Plankton across outrageous worlds. Master SpongeBob's elastic abilities and equip game-changing gadgets to solve puzzles, battle robots, and laugh out loud at the relentless barrage of nautical nonsense. Are you Spongeworthy enough to save the day?

name: Camp Lazlo - Leaky Lake Games
Description: Welcome to the Leaky Lake Games, where riotous camp adventures await! Take control of your favorite Bean Scout characters as you brave whirlwind mini-games that'll push your skills to the limit. Earn badges by competing in deliriously fun challenges spanning every corner of Camp Kidney. But watch out for devious rivals who'll stop at nothing to douse your camp spirit!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Volume 1
Description: Turtle Power reigns supreme! Team up with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, and Michelangelo as you brawl through iconic comic book settings. Battle the Foot Clan and other classic villains using each turtle's specialized combat skills and powerful team attacks. Master the gritty 80s tone and unravel a gripping storyline steeped in TMNT lore. The fate of New York rests on your half-shelled skills!

name: King of Fighters EX2, The - Howling Blood
Description: Rage awakens in this latest chapter of the epic King of Fighters saga! Customize your dream team of brawling champions and pummel foes with over-the-top combos and jaw-dropping special moves. Upgrade stats, abilities, and aesthetics to create an unstoppable force. Can you conquer the all-new Howling Blood tournament and claim the title of the ultimate King of Fighters?

name: Backyard Sports Football 2007
Description: It's game time in the neighborhood! Recruit your very own squad of wacky Backyard kids and lead them to gridiron glory. Defy physics with wild trick plays, unleash signature power-ups, and outduel opponents with hilarious smacktalk. Want to go pro? Hop into the brandnew Career mode and guide your rookie phenom to the big leagues. Let the backyard battle commence!

name: An American Tail - Fievel's Gold Rush
Description: Join Fievel, the brave young mouse, on an epic wild west adventure! After getting separated from his family, you'll explore expansive frontier environments, solve puzzles, and chase down thieves who stole a coveted treasure map. Avoid perilous predators, equip Fievel with useful tools, and team up with iconic characters in this spirited tale of a real American mouse-key.

name: Trollz - Hair Affair!
Description: It's time to rock some bodacious 'dos in the wildest hair-raising experience ever! Create the most outrageous hairstyles using an arsenal of styling tools, funky colors, and unconventional accessories. Then take your troll transformations to the stage and wow judges in stylish performances. Stand out from the crowd by mastering mini-games and embracing your unique troll spirit. This is one hair affair you can't miss!

name: Scooby-Doo! and The Cyber Chase
Description: Zoinks! A petrifying new menace has gone viral, trapping Scooby and the gang in a cyber nightmare. You'll need to use your sleuthing skills to escape creepy cyberworlds and unmask the sinister Phantom Virus. Solve mind-bending puzzles, collect Scooby Snacks for power-ups, and watch out for datanapper ghosts around every corner. Like, can you save the internet before it's too late?

name: Megaman Battle Network 6
Description: The future is in turmoil, and only Megaman has the cyber-sleuthing skills to stop it! Master the art of hacking and customization as you battle your way across a sprawling internet plagued by virus outbreaks. Unleash over 650 Battle Chips, explore haunting digital domains, and use real-world connectivity to power up your warrior. The fate of the cyberworld hangs in the balance!

Woody's back, and this time, he's embroiled in a hilarious escapade within the zany walls of Crazy Castle. Brace yourself for side-splitting antics and unexpected twists as our mischievous hero races against time.
Prepare to be swept away by a mesmerizing adventure that blurs the line between dreams and reality. Evergirl invites you to unravel a captivating mystery shrouded in wonder and enigma.
Buckle up for an adrenaline-fueled road trip like no other. Master hairpin turns, conquer challenging terrain, and leave your mark on the open road in this high-octane racing extravaganza.

Summertime Adventure: Join Strawberry Shortcake and her delightful friends on a whimsical summer escapade. Prepare for a heartwarming tale filled with laughter, friendship, and unforgettable moments that will leave you craving for more.

Immerse yourself in a rich, fantastical world where ancient legends come to life. Tales of Phantasia weaves an intricate tapestry of adventure, magic, and unforgettable characters that will captivate your imagination.

The Game: Step into the realm of Bionicle, where iconic heroes and villains clash in an epic struggle for survival. Prepare to wield powerful abilities and embark on a quest that will shape the destiny of an entire universe.

Games: Star Wars - Flight of the Falcon
Description: Buckle up and take the controls of the legendary Millennium Falcon as you navigate through perilous dogfights and daring missions in a galaxy far, far away. Prepare for an exhilarating ride that will test your piloting skills to the limit.
Dive into the whimsical and absorbent world of Bikini Bottom once again! Join SpongeBob, Patrick, and the whole gang for another round of nonsensical nautical nonsense that will leave you in stitches

Buckle up for a wild ride as Arnold and his quirky crew embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the familiar streets of their neighborhood. Get ready for heartwarming moments, hilarious misadventures, and a cinematic experience like no other.

Step into a world where farm animals lead secret lives after dark. Prepare to be utterly entertained as this hilarious and heartwarming tale unfolds, filled with unexpected twists and side-splitting antics that will leave you in stitches.

Games: Peter Pan - The Motion Picture Event
Description: Soar into the magical realm of Neverland, where childhood dreams come to life. Join Peter Pan, Wendy, and the Lost Boys on an enchanting journey that will reignite your sense of wonder and adventure.

Brace yourself for a heart-pounding, adrenaline-fueled challenge that will push your limits to the extreme. Fear Factor Unleashed invites you to confront your deepest fears and emerge victorious in this ultimate test of courage and determination.

Immerse yourself in the delightful world of felines, where every purr, meow, and playful prance will captivate your heart. Catz invites you to experience the joys and quirks of our feline friends in a charming and undeniably adorable adventure.

Step into the exhilarating world of robotic combat, where friendship and strategy collide. Unleash the power of your Medabot and battle your way through intense challenges, unlocking new abilities and forging unbreakable bonds along the way.

Prepare to serve up a storm as Mario and his iconic crew take to the courts in this exciting tennis adventure. Master powerful shots, clever tactics, and unleash your competitive spirit in a whirlwind of intense rallies and unforgettable matches.

Games: Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius vs. Jimmy Negatron, The
Description: Brace yourself for a mind-bending battle of wits as the brilliant Jimmy Neutron faces his ultimate nemesis – his own evil clone! Get ready for an epic clash of genius and hilarity that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Games: Shonen Jump's - Shaman King - Master of Spirits 2
Description: Immerse yourself in the world of Shaman King, where the line between the living and the dead blurs. Embark on a spiritual journey filled with intense battles, mystical powers, and a captivating tale that will resonate deep within your soul.

Games: Dragon Ball Z - The Collectible Card Game
Description: Step into the legendary Dragon Ball Z universe and experience the thrill of epic battles like never before. Collect powerful cards, strategize your moves, and unleash devastating combos as you relive the iconic moments that defined this beloved franchise.

Prepare for a gritty, action-packed adventure that blurs the lines between justice and vengeance. Dead to Rights invites you to step into the shoes of a rogue cop, where every decision has consequences, and the stakes are life and death.

Get ready to dive into a whirlwind of animated adventures as your favorite Cartoon Network characters come together for another hilarious and unforgettable journey. Brace yourself for non-stop laughs, unexpected twists, and boundless imagination.

Buckle up and get ready to race against iconic Nicktoons characters in a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled competition. Master power-ups, master challenging tracks, and leave your rivals in the dust as you speed towards the finish line.

The robotic hero Zero returns in an all-new adventure, filled with intense battles, challenging platforming, and a captivating story that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Upgrade your arsenal, master new abilities, and fight to save the world from impending doom.

Embark on another incredible journey through the world of Pokémon, where new challenges and unforgettable adventures await. Catch 'em all, battle fierce opponents, and uncover the secrets of this vast and enchanting universe.

Step into the shoes of Phil Diffy, a time-traveling teenager from the future, as he navigates the hilarious challenges of fitting into the past. Prepare for a comedic thrill ride filled with outrageous situations, clever problem-solving, and heartwarming family moments.

Celebrate the 10th anniversary of the iconic Rayman franchise with this special collection. Immerse yourself in two unforgettable adventures filled with quirky characters, breathtaking worlds, and mind-bending challenges that will test your platforming skills to the limits.

Games: Dora the Explorer - Super Star Adventures!
Description: Join Dora and her trusty companions on a whimsical quest filled with exciting challenges, educational puzzles, and heartwarming lessons. Prepare to embark on a journey that will captivate your imagination and teach valuable skills along the way.

Buckle up and get ready for high-octane action as you take control of your favorite Matchbox vehicles. Undertake daring missions, perform jaw-dropping stunts, and conquer challenging obstacles in this adrenaline-fueled adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat

The legendary Megaman series takes a thrilling new turn with Megaman Zero. Step into the shoes of this robotic hero as he battles his way through intense platforming challenges, fierce enemies, and a gripping storyline that will keep you hooked from start to finish.

Prepare for intense action in "Desert Strike Advance"! As a lone pilot in a deadly warzone, you’ll navigate treacherous deserts, rescuing hostages and dismantling enemy operations. Armed with a powerful Apache helicopter, every mission brings a new challenge, testing your skills and strategy. Can you outmaneuver enemy fire and complete your objectives? The fate of the region rests in your hands—dare to take on the strike!

Join Spyro in "Spyro - Attack of the Rhynocs" for an exhilarating adventure! The Dragon Realms are under siege by the menacing Rhynocs, and it's up to Spyro to save the day. Explore vibrant worlds, solve cunning puzzles, and unleash fiery attacks on enemies. With countless secrets to uncover and dangerous foes lurking, can Spyro restore peace and thwart the Rhynocs' sinister plans? Dive into the action and find out!

Step into the ultimate dueling academy with "Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Duel Academy"! Hone your skills, build powerful decks, and challenge fellow students in thrilling card battles. With mysterious rivals and legendary cards at stake, every duel could lead you closer to becoming the Duel Academy Champion. Are you ready to rise through the ranks and uncover the secrets hidden within the academy? Your destiny as a master duelist awaits!

Challenge your intellect with "Ultimate Brain Games"! Dive into a collection of classic board games and puzzles designed to test your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills. From chess to sudoku, each game offers a unique challenge that will keep you on your toes. Can you outsmart your opponents and conquer every game? Sharpen your mind and take on the ultimate brain-teasing adventure!

Join Shrek and his friends in "Shrek - Hassle at the Castle"! Embark on a wild adventure through the fairy-tale land, battling foes and solving puzzles to rescue Princess Fiona. With each level packed with surprises and challenges, can Shrek overcome the castle's tricks and traps? Dive into this magical quest and find out if you have what it takes to save the day!

Get ready for zany fun with "Tiny Toon Adventures - Wacky Stackers"! Join your favorite Tiny Toons in a fast-paced puzzle adventure where you stack, match, and clear wacky characters to score big. Each level brings new challenges and surprises that will test your quick thinking and strategy. Can you keep up with the craziness and become the ultimate stacker? Jump into the action and find out!

Dive into a whimsical underwater world with "The Amazing Virtual Sea-Monkeys"! Raise and nurture your own colony of magical Sea-Monkeys, watching them grow and thrive. Explore a vibrant aquatic environment filled with surprises and hidden secrets. Can you create the ultimate Sea-Monkey paradise and uncover all the mysteries beneath the waves? The adventure awaits in this captivating virtual aquarium!

Get ready for frantic fun with "Whac-a-Mole"! Test your reflexes in this classic arcade game where moles pop up and you whack them back down. Each level gets faster and more challenging—can you keep up? With every mole you hit, you're one step closer to victory. Can you conquer the chaos and set a new high score? Dive into the whacking madness and find out!

Step up to the plate in "Backyard Baseball"! Choose your team of neighborhood all-stars and play ball in action-packed games. With unpredictable pitches, powerful swings, and unique fields, every match is a new adventure. Can you lead your team to victory and become the neighborhood champion? Grab your bat and find out in this ultimate backyard showdown!

Enter the digital arena in "Digimon - Battle Spirit"! Choose your favorite Digimon and face off in fast-paced, action-packed battles. Unleash powerful attacks and special moves to dominate your opponents. With each victory, your Digimon grows stronger. Can you unlock their true potential and become the ultimate Battle Spirit champion? Jump into the fight and discover the hidden powers within!

Embark on an epic journey through the Cartoon Network universe in "Cartoon Network Collection - Special Edition"! Join your favorite characters from iconic shows in a collection of mini-games and challenges. From daring adventures to mind-bending puzzles, each game offers endless excitement. Can you conquer every challenge and unlock exclusive content? The fate of the Cartoon Network world rests in your hands—immerse yourself in this special edition and unleash the power of nostalgia!
